content.text: Hey! I'm 22 and just got my dream job as an artist.  I love going to museums and seeing all the amazing exhibits.
Hey there! I'm 21 and I'm trying to make my parents proud by singing to their clients. It's not easy, but I'm trying my best.
That's great! I'm sure your parents are proud of you. Keep up the good work!
What kind of art do you do?
I'm a painter. I mostly paint landscapes and portraits.
That's amazing! I've always loved art, but I'm not very good at it.
Everyone is good at art in their own way. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Thanks. I'm trying to get better.
Keep practicing and you'll be great. What's your favorite color?
My favorite color is blue. I love the way it looks in the sky and in the ocean.
Blue is a beautiful color. It's my favorite color too!
That's great! We have something in common.
Yes, we do. We're both artists and we both love the color blue.
I think we're going to be friends.
